member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.WicBuilder.WicBuilderPlugin.BuildJobWic(System.Byte[],System.Int64,ImageResizer.ImageJob,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decodes the image in byte[] data, performs the image proccessing, and encodes it to job.Dest
member.param: The buffer containing the encoded image file
The number of bytes to read

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.WicEncoder.WicEncoderPlugin.IsValidOutputFormat(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Returns true if the this encoder supports the specified image format

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.WicEncoder.WicEncoderPlugin.Subsampling
member.summary: The Jpeg subsampling. Supported values for WIC are 420, 422, and 444. FreeImage supports 411 in addition to the aforementioned values.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.WicEncoder.WicEncoderPlugin.Colors
member.summary: The number of colors to use. Only applicable for png, gif, and bmp photos where palletes can be used. The default is -1, which means "as much color fidelity as possible".

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.WicEncoder.WicEncoderPlugin.Dither
member.summary: If true, error-diffusion dithering will be applied to 8-bit output images

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Wic.WicBitmapPadder.#ctor(ImageResizer.Plugins.Wic.InteropServices.ComTypes.IWICBitmapSource,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],ImageResizer.Plugins.Wic.InteropServices.ComTypes.WICRect)
member.summary: Adds padding to a bitmap, optionally cropping it at the same time.
